int main(void)
{
	DDRA=0XFF;
	DDRB=0x00;
	DDRC=0xFF;
	DDRD=0xFF;
	
	MCUCSR|=(1<<JTD);
	MCUCSR|=(1<<JTD);
	
	unsigned int pc = 0x00;
	int prevclk = 0;
	int currclk = 0;
	int jump = 0;
	int reset = 0;
	int bsel = 0;
	unsigned int jmpby;
	
	/* Replace with your application code */
	while (1) {
		prevclk = currclk;
		char b = PINB;
		currclk = ( b & 0b00000001);
		jump =    ( b & 0b00000010)>>1;
		bsel =    ( b & 0b00000100)>>2;
		reset =   ( b & 0b00001000)>>3;
		
		int ins = instruction[pc];
		
		if(reset==1){
			pc = 0;
		}
		else{
			if(prevclk==1 && currclk==0){
				if(jump==1) pc = (ins>>4)%(1<<8);
				else{
					pc++;
					if(bsel==1){
						jmpby = ins%16;
						jmpby = jmpby & 15;
						if(jmpby>=8) pc+=jmpby-16;
						else pc+=jmpby;
						//pc = 31;
					}
				}
			}
		}
		pc%=256;
		
		unsigned char c;
		c = (instruction[pc]%(1<<8))&(0xff);
		PORTA = c;
		c = ((instruction[pc])>>8)&(0xff);
		PORTC = c;
		c = pc & (0xff);
		PORTD = c;
		_delay_ms(10);
	}
}
